attributes.additional_details: Of the petitions which have reached the signing requirements for a debate or government response, the debate or government response serves only to tell those who signed why their will is not possible or not desirable. Stop pretending to care about what people think outside of elections or referenda.
attributes.background: The parliamentary petitions website serves only to waste people's time by allowing them to sign petitions that have no effect. You may get a second class Westminster Hall debate that only serves to put an end to the matter. Our voice is already (hopefully) represented by our Member of Parliament.
